posts.post_content:
Hello everyone. I am wanting to purchase or trade for T210-2 cards. I am looking for cards in the SGC 50+ PSA 5+ range for a few upgrades. I have a few Series 2,3,and 4 duplicates to trade. Thank you for any responses/help with my upgrades.

Jason
Happy to pick up a few recently. Im still looking to trade for or purchase Series 2 Mid/High grade. Thanks guys.
